document_data.name: Leggings
document_data.mainbody: '''Leggings''' were several types of leg coverings common throughout much of the Realms.
document_data.Availability: * [[Boom's Garden]], a clothing shop in [[Waterdeep]], offered full [[chainmail]] leggings and partial [[plate mail]] leggings, at a cost of 35 and 33 [[gold piece]]s respectively. This store also sold these leggings through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']].

Notable Wearers.General: * It was quite common for smiths to wear [[leather]] leggings alongside their leather [[apron]]s.

* [[Tulrun]] wore bearskin leggings.{{Cite polyhedron/125/Wayward Wizards: Tulrun of the Tent|24}}
Notable Wearers.Races & Intelligent Creatures: * [[Bacchae]] commonly dressed in woolen leggings during the winter season.
Notable Wearers.Regions & Nations:
* In the nation of [[Damara]], warriors typically dressed in warm leggings.<ref>
* Citizens of [[Mulmaster]] typically dressed in leather leggings.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/64/The Everwinking Eye: Daily Life in Mulmaster|20}}
* In the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] the [[aquatic elves]], [[shalarin]], and [[triton]]s wore armored leggings made out of [[silverweave]].<ref>
* In the nation of [[Thay]], warriors typically dressed in crimson trousers.<ref>
Notable Wearers.Religions:
* [[Adventurer]]s who worshiped [[Bhaal]] often dressed in black leggings.
* [[Druid]]s of [[Silvanus]] sometimes dressed in fur leggings.
* The [[Dwarven pantheon|Dwarven deity]] [[Moradin]]'s [[avatar]] form dressed in the leather leggings typical of smiths.<ref>
* The guards of the [[House of the Moon]] dressed in chainmail leggings.{{Cite comic/Selune Rising}}
